nodes.text: The Red Hills Clan was a Dathomiri Witch clan based around the Red Hills on Dathomir. Unlike most of the Dathomir clans, its male population was higher than most. Augwynne Djo sent a messenger to the clan in 8 ABY, asking for support against the Nightsisters. After the battle of Dathomir, the clan sent a representative to the Sisters of the Singing Mountain Clan to celebrate the victory over the Nightsisters.
